column4: hello all, I'm going to change my laptop, nVidia® GeForce™ G103M or ATI Mobility™ Radeon™ HD3430, as graphic card ?
In general, nvidia seems to dance along better with linux (provided you're ok, with using proprietary drivers)
ok, well, I was referring to ati/nvid in general, if you find that the ati seems to have less issues on ubuntu when you search around, I guess that would be a wiser choice...
